text: Andros Maritime Museum is a museum in Andros, Greece. It was founded in 1972 for the purpose of gathering and preserving naval objects found in Andros. The objects that are exhibited are related to Andros' naval life. There are a lot of lithography presenting everyday life, insurance policies, cutlery, uniforms, naval diaries and some ship models. The museum is established in an old building in the city Of Andros that was given to municipality of Andros by Dimitrios Rallias. ==External links== *Museum in Municipality's Official website *Maritime Museum of Andros Category:Maritime museums in Greece Category:Buildings and structures in Andros Category:Museums in the South Aegean
title: Andros Maritime Museum
